productInformation.value: This argan oil enriched conditioner deeply hydrates to provide moisture and shine to dry, brittle hair See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get Soft, Shiny Hair With Redken All Soft Haircare Replenish Dry Hair With Redken All Soft Haircare Hair feeling dry, dull and brittle? All Soft is the professional solution range to moisturize dry, brittle hair with its argan oil-enriched formula that delivers extended softness. This range moisturizes and nourishes hair deeply, while increasing manageability, suppleness and shine. Moisturize Dry Hair & Boost Shine With Argan Oil Redken's Moisture Complex technology also contains Argan Oil, a plant oil and key ingredient that helps moisturize and condition dry and/or brittle hair. For 15x more conditioning, use All Soft Shampoo, All Soft Conditioner & Moisture Restore Leave-In Treatment as a full system.

Redken All Soft Haircare Moisturize Dry Hair and Restore Shine With Argan Oil-Enriched Formulas Hair feeling dry, dull and brittle? Restore moisture and shine to dry hair with Redken's All Soft Haircare system. Redken All Soft Hair features Redken's Moisture Complex with Argan Oil to detangle, moisturize, soften, and add shine to dry, brittle hair.

Explore The All Soft Range Conditioner Add to Cart Shampoo Add to Cart Heavy Cream Add to Cart Argan Oil Add to Cart Moisture Restore Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 18,036 4.7 out of 5 stars 18,856 4.7 out of 5 stars 3,877 4.6 out of 5 stars 3,064 4.5 out of 5 stars 783 Price $26.00$26.00 $26.00$26.00 $32.00$32.00 $36.00$36.00 $29.41$29.41 Hair Type Dry, brittle or damaged hair Dry, brittle or damaged hair Dry, brittle or damaged hair Dry, brittle or damaged hair Dry, brittle or damaged hair Description Detangles & softens hair Gently cleanses & softens hair Deep conditioning mask Deep conditioning & suppleness Hydrating leave-in treatment Main Benefits Hair manageability and shine Silky, smooth, and shiny hair Improved manageability & shine Concentrated softness & shine Immediate moisture and shine Key Ingredients Argan Oil Argan Oil Argan Oil Argan Oil and Omega-6 formula Argan Oil and Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Complex % 5% Moisture Complex 2% Moisture Complex 12% Moisture Complex 12% Moisture Complex 5% Moisture Complex Suggested Use Apply to midends after shampoo Apply a quarter on damp hair Leave on 5min and rinse Apply to mid-lenghs & ends Apply to towel-dried hair

Which Redken Range Is Right For You? All Soft Acidic Bonding Concentrate Extreme Hair Type Dry, brittle hair Hair Type All types of damaged hair Hair Type Damaged, distressed hair Best For Moisturizing & nourishing hair Best For Reinforcing hair strength Best For Promoting overall hair health Key Ingredients Argan oil and Moisture Complex Key Ingredients Alpha hydroxy citric acid Key Ingredients Protein and Strength Complex Benefits Softness, suppleness and shine Benefits Smoothness and conditioning Benefits 73% less breakage

Who is All Soft best for? All Soft is best for those who have dry, brittle hair that need moisture and softness. What is the main ingredient in All Soft? All Soft contains Argan Oil as part of a Moisture Complex formula, which is known for promoting moisture and softness. What is the key benefit of All Soft Conditioner? All Soft Conditioner detangles and provides increased manageability and shine. What is the full All Soft Regimen? Reden's full All Soft haircare regimen includes: All Soft Shampoo, All Soft Conditioner, All Soft Heavy Cream, All Soft Leave-In and All Soft Argan Oil. Should I use the entire regimen to see results? For best results and 15x more conditioning, use Redken All Soft Shampoo, Conditioner and Leave-In Treatment daily as a full system. Heavy treatment mask can be used weekly in place of conditioner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All Soft shampoo and conditioner
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner ever. I’ve used it for several years. It took my hair instantly from feeling dry and brittle to soft as silk. It’s worth every penny! It miraculously re-appeared in my mailbox this morningIt wasn’t there on the 3rd. No idea what happened. I do not need a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.reviewText: Feels very nice when applying. A very lotion like consistency and also very hydrating! For me it doesn't leave behind any residue or film on the hair so I guess you can say also lightweight. Smells Lovely!Definitely recommend and will be repurchasing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unbelievably soft hair
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is fantastic. It’s thick and luxurious and actually makes my dry, color treated hair feel soft. It also came same day which was amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick Hair Approved
reviews.reviewText: Finally, a conditioner that makes my hair soft and shiny!! I have long, thick hair and struggle to find a conditioner that is safe for color treated hair that really feels like it makes a difference. This is it!! I have spent so much money trying everything and almost gave up. This doesn't wash out my deep red/purple color on my naturally dark hair and leaves it soft and manageable without adding 5 more products after I wash my hair. I was ready to cut my hair until I came across this line!! Don't hesitate, buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice and works
reviews.reviewText: It leaves my hair soft but not as soft as I had hoped. COVID left my bleached blonde hair dry brittle and in horrible shape and it never got that way before COVID so that’s ehy I blame COVID! Anyway I have tried every high end product out there and this one does an excellent job but not the miracle I had hoped for, I guess scissors are my only option now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fabulous conditioner. Makes my hair noticeably softer. Much better than the Bumble & Bumble conditioner I was using and less expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: great for the my hair. A very little goes a long way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is thick and works so well! Smells amazing and you don’t need to use a ton so it lasts a long time. Great buy
En general es un buen producto, si deja el cabello suave y bonito.

reviews.reviewTitle: leaves my hair soft and shiny
reviews.reviewText: I used to use OGX argan oil for I wanna say 10 years now and after Jan of 2023, they changed the formula i used to use their shampoo, conditioner, and oil and after they changed it my hair was left feeling dry, greasy and generally just awful looking Did tons of research and switched to this stuff and its miles better. I am a dude in his 20s with thin wavy hair and this is the best stuff ive ever used. Kinda pricy but worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto lo llevo usando este año y son buenos los resultados
reviews.reviewText: Me encanta, es un excelente producto me deja el cabello suave y luminoso sobre todo porque lo tengo teñido

reviews.reviewTitle: Ayuda a que el pelo no este quebradizo

reviews.reviewText: Spedizione arrivata puntuale, il prodotto lo conoscevo già perché usato dalla mia parrucchiera, lo trovo ottimo per i miei capelli lunghi e un po’ crespi. Lo associo allo shampoo e insieme il risultato è strabiliante. Da consigliare assolutamente!!
